post.text:
One week to go.

Watch Hillary talk about what's at stake for women in this election on the trail in Florida â†“

comment.author: Kara
comment.text: Say hi to Saudi Arabia for me Hillary! They love women there so much they gave you $25 million. They still beat them and let them have no rights, but at least they love you!

replies.author: Lee
replies.text: But it's ok for Trump to do millions in business with them?

replies.author: Kara
replies.text: Accepting payouts while in office is not business.
